message.content: {"responses":[{"question_id":"TT4G35A","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.","response":"Agree"},{"question_id":"TT4G35B","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students’ abilities.","response":"Agree"},{"question_id":"TT4G35C","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.","response":"Agree"},{"question_id":"TT4G35D","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).","response":"Strongly agree"},{"question_id":"TT4G35E","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.","response":"Agree"},{"question_id":"TT4G35F","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others’ work as their own.","response":"Strongly agree"},{"question_id":"TT4G35G","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.","response":"Agree"},{"question_id":"TT4G35H","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students’ misconceptions.","response":"Agree"},{"question_id":"TT4G35I","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.","response":"Strongly agree"},{"question_id":"TT4G35J","input_statement":"Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.","response":"Disagree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
**Analyzing AI Impact on Teaching**

I've been assessing the potential of AI in education from the perspective of a Croatian primary/secondary school teacher. Lesson plan suggestions are viewed as very helpful, and I strongly agree on AI's ability to support students with specific needs. However, I am also wary of the risks, especially plagiarism and privacy issues. I've noted a cautious view on potential pedagogical missteps.
